translated: * ЁЯСЙ  Jammu Kashmir: Encounter continues ЁЯФл  in Budgam, ЁЯСе  two terrorists ЁЯдХ  killed, four jawans injured The officials have given information about this. According to ANI report, two terrorists have been killed in the encounter. Four soldiers were also injured during the encounter. This encounter is still going on. At least three terrorists are suspected to be hiding in a house in the area. More information about this news is awaited. On Thursday too, four militants were killed in two encounters with security forces in Shopian and Kupwara districts of Jammu and Kashmir. A police spokesperson had said that the security forces had been informed of the militants in the Yavaran forest area of тАЛтАЛthe district, following which an anti-terrorism operation was conducted there. The subsequent encounter killed three militants. "The slain terrorists were identified as Sajad Khande, Aaqib Ahmed Dar and Basharat Ahmad Mir," the spokesman said. translated: * It is a sign of maturity and deep understanding of Sadhvi Ji. He did not consider his personal suffering to be above the country. When only a few twisted his statement, he made it clear that even though Hemant, who had tortured me, was wrong, but he is dead from the enemy's bullet, therefore he would be considered a martyr. He withdrew his statement just to stop politics. * * The statement was made earlier because when he got a candidate in Bhopal, some people started making a fake issue of "Hindu terrorism" on him. Then he openly told Kunbo's conspiracy of "Hindu terrorism" by holding a press meeting. Hemant and Kunbe were absolutely involved in that conspiracy. He told the world that he is a "living force" of the conspiracy of "Hindu terrorism". * * In this country, martyr status has also been given to alcoholics, Rajiv etc. who killed them like Bhindra, Prabhakaran (supporters of) both of them. Was born today. * Pakistan's problem, Pakistan's problem of dedicated terrorism, Kashmir problem, China problem, good news, unemployment, poverty, etc. The problem of any country, just mention any one problem. O Get yourself at the root of the reasons you will soon Kunnbo birth giver of every problem. Remedies for problems of 55 years will not leave the saffron of 15-20 years out of political stability. * * If someone sets a fire in the forest but thinks that if he burns, then only the other village but sometimes his village is also burnt . There is a saying - Those who dig pits for others, they themselves fall into it. The same has happened in history with Kunbo. * * Unfortunately, the freedom revolutionaries were always considered terrorists by these Kunbos. * * We Indians are just Ram Ji, Krishna Ji, Ved Purana, Guru Nanak Dev Ji, Guru Gobind Singh Ji , Every ascetic of the country will only respect the learned, but will not follow the path mentioned by him. We will definitely discuss his talk, but will not listen to his words. This is the reason why we remained slaves for 1260 years. * * Try / Try Friends, you will get success sometime. Those trying to never give up. * ++++++++++++++ * After a whole day of uproar, Sadhvi Pragya took back her statement on Hemant Karkare * * Election Desk, Amar Ujala, New Delhi * * Fri, 19 Apr 2019 * https://www.amarujala.com/india-news/lok-sabha-chunav-2019-sadhvi-pragya-thakur-takes-back-his-statement-on-hemant-karkare * BJP candidate from Bhopal Lok Sabha seat Sadhvi Pragya Thakur has withdrawn the statement on martyr Hemant Karkare. After the uproar over the statement, Sadhvi Pragya said today that I withdraw the statement given on Hemant Karkare. This was my personal statement. * * He said, I felt that the enemies of the country were benefiting from my statement. So I withdraw my statement and apologize. This was my personal pain. He was shot dead while fighting the terrorists, he is definitely a martyr. * * Let us tell you that there was a political uproar about his statement and the BJP disassociated itself from this statement. * * Sadhvi on Thursday On IPS officer Hemant Karkare had given controversial statement which was getting condemned all around. Today the BJP also issued a statement, calling it a personal statement of Sadhvi Pragya. Finally, on Friday evening, he withdrew the statement. * * BJP on Friday distanced itself from Sadhvi Pragya Singh Thakur's statement that IPS officer Hemant Karkare was killed during the 26/11 Mumbai terror attacks because of the curse given by him. BJP said it was his personal opinion which could be due to the physical and mental torture he had received for years. * * BJP said in the statement that Karkare was bravely killed while fighting terrorists. The BJP has always considered him a martyr. The party said that Sadhvi Pragya suffered physical and mental torture in police custody for years, which could be the reason for her statement. *

рдЬрд╣рд╛рдБ рдЬреИрд╕реЗ рдХрд╛рдо рдирд┐рдХрд▓реЗ рд╡реИрд╕рд╛ рдХрд░реЛ!  6. рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░ - рджреЗрд╢ рддреЛреЬрдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓реА рд╡рд┐рджреЗрд╢реА рддрд╛рдХрддреЛрдВ рдХреЗ рд╣рд╛рде рдХреА рдХрдардкреБрддрд▓реА рдмрдирдирд╛ рдЧрд▓рдд рд╣реИ! рдЕрдиреЗрдХ рдкреНрд░рд▓реЛрднрди рдорд┐рд▓рдиреЗ рдХреЗ рдмрд╛рдж рднреА рдореБрдЭреЗ рдЕрд╕реНрд╡реАрдХрд╛рд░ рд╣реИ!   рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА- рджреБрдХрд╛рдирджрд╛рд░реА рдкрд╣рд▓реЗ рджреЗрд╢ рдмрд╛рдж рдореЗрдВ! NGO рдХрд╛ рдзрдВрдзрд╛ рддреЛ рдЪрд▓рддрд╛ рд╣реА рд╡рд┐рджреЗрд╢реА рдкреИрд╕реЗ рдХреЗ рдмрд▓ рдкрд░ рд╣реИрдВ! рд╡рд┐рджреЗрд╢ рд╕реЗ рдкреИрд╕реЗ рд▓реЛ рджреЗрд╢ рдХреЛ рдмрд░реНрдмрд╛рдж рдХрд░реЛ!  7. рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░- рджреЗрд╢ рдХреА рдЖреЫрд╛рджреА рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рд╕рдВрдШрд░реНрд╖ рдХрд░рдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓реЗ рдХреНрд░рд╛рдВрддрд┐рдХрд╛рд░рд┐рдпреЛрдВ рдФрд░ рднрд╛рд░рдд рдХреЗ рд╡реАрд░ рд╕реИрдирд┐рдХреЛрдВ рдХрд╛ рд╕рдореНрдорд╛рди рд╣реЛ!   рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА- рднрд╛рд░рддреАрдп рд╕реЗрдирд╛ рдкрд░ рд╣рдорд▓рд╛ рдХрд░рдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓реЗ, рдкрд╛рдХ рд╕рдорд░реНрдердХ рдХрд╢реНрдореАрд░ рдХреЗ рдЖрддрдВрдХрд╡рд╛рджрд┐рдпреЛрдВ рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП реЫрд┐рдВрджрд╛рдмрд╛рдж! рдЕрд╕рд▓реА рд╕рд┐рдкрд╛рд╣реА рд╡рд╣реА рд╣реИ! рднрд╛рд░рддреАрдп рд╕реЗрдирд╛ рдиреЗ рдХрд╢реНрдореАрд░ рдкрд░ рдХрдмреНреЫрд╛ рдХрд┐рдпрд╛ рд╣реБрдЖ рд╣реИрдВ!  8. рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░ - рд╡рдиреНрджреЗ рдорд╛рддрд░рдо, рднрд╛рд░рдд рдордд рдХреА рдЬрдп рдЖрджрд┐ рдирд╛рд░рд╛ рд▓рдЧрд╛рдиреЗ рдХрд╛ рдореИрдВ рд╕рдорд░реНрдерди рдХрд░рддрд╛ рд╣реВрдБ!   рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА- рдЬрдп рдЕрдореНрдореА, рдЬрдп рд╣рд┐рдиреНрдж рдХрд╛ рдирд╛рд░рд╛ рд▓рдЧрд╛рдПрдВрдЧреЗ рдордЧрд░ рднрд╛рд░рдд рдорд╛рддрд╛ рдХреА рдЬрдп рдФрд░ рд╡рдиреНрджреЗ рдорд╛рддрд░рдо рдХрд╣рдиреЗ рдореЗрдВ рджрд┐рдХреНрдХрдд рд╣реИрдВ, рдХреНрдпреВрдВрдХрд┐ рд╣рдо рддреЛ рд╕рд╣реВрд▓рд┐рдпрдд рдкрд░ рд╡рд┐рд╢реНрд╡рд╛рд╕ рдХрд░рддреЗ рд╣реИ!  9. рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░ - рджреЗрд╢ рдХреА рдЙрдиреНрдирддрд┐ рдХрд░рдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓реЛрдВ рдХреЗ рд╕рд╛рде рдорд┐рд▓рдХрд░ рдХрд╛рдо рдХрд░рдирд╛ рдЧрд▓рдд рдирд╣реАрдВ рд╣реИрдВ!   рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА- рд╣рдо рдХреЗрд╡рд▓ рдирд╛рд╕реНрддрд┐рдХреЛрдВ, рдореБрд╕рд▓рдорд╛рдиреЛрдВ рдФрд░ рдИрд╕рд╛рдИрдпреЛрдВ рдХрд╛ рд╕рдорд░реНрдерди рдХрд░реЗрдВрдЧреЗ, рдХреНрдпреВрдВрдХрд┐ рдмрд╛рдХрд┐ рд╕рднреА рдмреНрд░рд╛рд╣реНрдордгрд╡рд╛рджреА рдФрд░ рдордиреБрд╡рд╛рджреА рд╣реИрдВ!  10. рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░- рдЬреАрд╡рди рдореЗрдВ рдЖрдЧреЗ рдмреЭрдиреЗ рдХреЗ рд▓рд┐рдП рдкреБрд░реБрд╖рд╛рд░реНрде рдХрд░реЛ, рд╕рдХрд╛рд░рд╛рддреНрдордХ рдХрд╛рд░реНрдп рдХрд░реЛ! рд╕рджрд╛рдЪрд╛рд░реА, рд╕рдВрдпрдореА, рд╢реБрджреНрдз рдЖрдЪрд░рдг рд╡рд╛рд▓рд╛, рдкреНрд░рдЧрддрд┐рд╢реАрд▓ рдмрдиреЛ!  рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА- рд╣рдо рдХреЗрд╡рд▓ рд╡рд┐рд░реЛрдз рдХрд░рдирд╛ рдЬрд╛рдирддреЗ рд╣реИрдВ! рдЪрд╛рд╣реЗ рдЕрдЪреНрдЫреА рдмрд╛рдд рд╣реЛ рдЪрд╛рд╣реЗ рдмреБрд░реА рдмрд╛рдд рд╣реЛ! рдЪрд┐рд▓реНрд▓рд╛ рдЪрд┐рд▓реНрд▓рд╛ рдХрд░ рдЕрдкрдирд╛ рд╣рдХ рд▓реЗрдВрдЧреЗ! рдордЧрд░ рдХрд╛рдо рдХреБрдЫ рдирд╣реАрдВ рдХрд░реЗрдВрдЧреЗ!   11. рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░- рдорд╛рдВрд╕ рдЦрд╛рдирд╛ рдЧрд▓рдд рд╣реИ!   рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА- рдмреАреЮ рдкрд╛рд░реНрдЯреА рдХрд░рдирд╛ рд╣рдорд╛рд░рд╛ рдореМрд▓рд┐рдХ рд╣рдХ рд╣реИрдВ! рдорд╛рдВрд╕ рдЦрд╛рдиреЗ рдореЗрдВ рдХреЛрдИ рд╣рд┐рдВрд╕рд╛ рдирд╣реАрдВ рд╣реИрдВ! рдЧреЛрдорд╛рдВрд╕ рдЦрд╛рдПрдВрдЧреЗ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА рдХрд╣рд▓рд╛рдПрдВрдЧреЗ! рдЧреЛрдорд╛рдВрд╕ рдЦрд╛рдиреЗ рд╕реЗ рд╣рдо рдореБрд╕рд▓рдорд╛рдиреЛрдВ рдХреЗ рдорд┐рддреНрд░ рдмрди рдЬрд╛рддреЗ рд╣реИрдВ!  12. рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░- рдмреБрджреНрдз рдХреЗ рдЕрд╣рд┐рдВрд╕рд╛ рдХреЗ рд╕рдиреНрджреЗрд╢ рдкрд░ рдЪрд▓реЛ!  рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА- рдЕрд╣рд┐рдВрд╕рд╛ рдХрд╛ рддрдЧрдорд╛ рдЧрд▓реЗ рдореЗрдВ рд▓рдЯрдХрд╛ рдХрд░ рд╣рдо рд╕рджрд╛ рд╡реИрдЪрд╛рд░рд┐рдХ рд╣рд┐рдВрд╕рд╛ рдФрд░ рдкреНрд░рджреБрд╖рдг рдХрд░рддреЗ рд╣реИрдВ рдХреНрдпреВрдВрдХрд┐ рд╣рдо рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА рдордд рд╡рд╛рд▓реЗ рд╣реИрдВ!  рдпрд╣рд╛рдБ рдХреБрдЫ рдЙрджрд╣рд╛рд░рдг рджрд┐рдП рдЧрдП рд╣реИрдВ! рдорд┐рддреНрд░реЛрдВ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА рдордд рдХреЗ рд╡рд┐рд╖рдп рдореЗрдВ рдЕрдкрдиреЗ рд╡рд┐рдЪрд╛рд░ рдЕрд╡рд╢реНрдп рд▓рд┐рдЦрд┐рдП! рдЗрд╕ рдордд рдХреЛ рдЪрд▓рд╛рдиреЗ рд╡рд╛рд▓реЛрдВ рдХрд╛ рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░ рдХреА рдорд╛рдиреНрдпрддрд╛рдУрдВ рд╕реЗ рдХреБрдЫ рднреА рд▓реЗрдирд╛ рджреЗрдирд╛ рдирд╣реАрдВ рд╣реИрдВ! рдпреЗ рд▓реЛрдЧ рдХреЗрд╡рд▓ рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░ рдХреЗ рдирд╛рдо рдХрд╛ рдкреНрд░рдпреЛрдЧ рдХрд░ рдЕрдкрдиреА рд░рдЬрдиреАрддрд┐рдХ рд░реЛрдЯрд┐рдпрд╛рдВ рд╕реЗрдХрддреЗ рд╣реИрдВ! рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░ рдХреЗ рдирд╛рдо рдкрд░ рджреЗрд╢ рд╡рд┐рд░реЛрдзреА, рд╕рдорд╛рдЬ рд╡рд┐рд░реЛрдзреА рдХрд╛рд░реНрдпреЛрдВ рдХреЛ рдХрд░рддреЗ рд╣реИрдВ! рдЗрдирдХреЗ рджреБрд╖реНрдкреНрд░рдЪрд╛рд░ рдХреЗ рдХрд╛рд░рдг рдЬрд╛рдиреЗ-рдЕрдирдЬрд╛рдиреЗ рдореЗрдВ рдЕрдиреЗрдХ рджрд▓рд┐рдд рдпреБрд╡рд╛ рднреНрд░рдорд┐рдд рд╣реЛрдХрд░ рдЕрдкрдирд╛ рдФрд░ рджреЗрд╢ рдХрд╛ рдЕрд╣рд┐рдд рдХрд░рдиреЗ рдореЗрдВ рд▓рдЧ рдЧрдП рд╣реИрдВ!  рджреЗрд╢рд╣рд┐рдд рдореЗрдВ рдЬрд╛рд░реА рдЗрд╕ рд▓реЗрдЦ рдХреЛ рд╢реЗрдпрд░ рдЕрд╡рд╢реНрдп рдХреАрдЬрд┐рдпреЗ!  рдиреЛрдЯ- рдЧрд╛рд▓реА рдЧрд▓реЛрдЪ, рдЕрд╕рднреНрдп рднрд╛рд╖рд╛ рдЖрджрд┐ рдХрд╛ рдкреНрд░рдпреЛрдЧ рдХрд░рдиреЗ рдХреЗ рд╕реНрдерд╛рди рдкрд░ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рджреА рдЗрд╕ рдкреЛрд╕реНрдЯ рдХреЛ рдкреЭ рдХрд░ рдЖрддреНрдордЪрд┐рдВрддрди рдХрд░реЗрдВ рдХреА рд╡рд╣ рдбреЙ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░ рдХреЗ рд╕рдорд░реНрдердХ рд╣реИрдВ рдЕрдерд╡рд╛ рдЕрдореНрдмреЗрдбрдХрд░рд╡рд╛рдж рдордд рдХреЗ рд╕рдорд░реНрдердХ рд╣реИрдВ!
translated: A new drama has become popular in the name of Dr. Ambedkar! Its purpose is to provoke the immature people using only Dr. Ambedkar's name! His beliefs are completely opposite to Dr. Ambedkar's beliefs! See how- 1. Dr. Ambedkar- Aryans did not come from outside. Aryan invasion theory is just a fantasy of Western writers! Ambedkarite - Dalit people are indigenous to India! The Brahmin Aryans defeated and captured this country! All Brahmins are Aryans, all Dalits are non-Aryans! 2. Dr. Ambedkar - Islam is practically not able to convey the message of equanimity and fraternity, so all the Dalits come to India when Pakistan was formed in 1947! History is a witness to this fact! Ambedkarite - Islam preaches unity and brotherhood! We have no problem in accepting Islam! 3. Dr. Ambedkar - Christian society converts poor, infirm, afflicted Hindus on the basis of money, education, job, medical facilities etc.! This is wrong! Ambedkarite- Take money and become a Christian! No big brother, brother! Never oppose this devious policy of Christians! 4. Dr. Ambedkar - Nationalism is on top and will remain! Nothing above the nation! Ambedkarite - We are with those who raise the slogan of India's ruin! Self-interest first nationalism later! 5. Dr. Ambedkar- It is our moral duty to respect and abide by the Constitution! Ambedkarite - We support anti-constitutional Islamic Fatwas! We oppose the hanging of Afzal Guru and Yakub Menon who were hanged on the basis of the constitution! Do as you please 6. Dr. Ambedkar - It is wrong to be a puppet in the hands of foreign forces that break the country! Even after receiving many temptations, I still reject it! Ambedkarite - shoplifting first country later! NGO's business is on the strength of foreign money. Take money from abroad ruin the country! 7. Dr. Ambedkar - Respect for the revolutionaries who fought for the freedom of the country and the brave soldiers of India! Ambedkarite - alive for the pro-Pakistan militants who attacked the Indian Army! He is the real soldier! Kashmir is occupied by the Indian Army! 8. Dr. Ambedkar - I support Vande Mataram, Bharat Mata ki Jai etc. slogan! Ambedkarites - Jai Ammi, Jai Hind will raise slogans, but Bharat Mata ki Jai and Vande Mataram have difficulty in saying, because we believe in convenience! 9. Dr. Ambedkar - It is not wrong to work together with those who progress the country! Ambedkarite - We will only support atheists, Muslims and Christians, as all others are Brahminical and Manuwadi! 10. Dr. Ambedkar- Make effort to move forward in life, do positive work! Be virtuous, sober, pure-minded, progressive! Ambedkarite - We only know how to resist! Whether it is a good thing or a bad thing! Will take his right after shouting But nothing will work 11. Dr. Ambedkar- It is wrong to eat meat! Ambedkarite - Beef party is our fundamental right! There is no violence in meat eating! Eating beef will be called Ambedkarites! Eating beef makes us friends of Muslims! 12. Dr. Ambedkar - Walk on the Buddha's message of non-violence! Ambedkarite - By hanging around the neck of non-violence, we always do ideological violence and pollution because we are Ambedkarite. Here are some examples! Friends, do write your thoughts about Ambedkarite opinion! Those who run this opinion have nothing to do with Dr. Ambedkar's beliefs! These people cook their political loaves using only Dr. Ambedkar's name! In the name of Dr. Ambedkar, do anti-national, anti-social works! Due to their misinformation, many Dalit youths have become confused and unknowingly engaged in doing harm to themselves and the country! Do share this article issued in the interest of the country! Note- Instead of using abusive language, vulgar language, etc. Ambedkarites should read this post and be complacent whether they are supporters of Dr. Ambedkar or are supporters of Ambedkarism.

translated: Ghulam Nabi Azad did not just say that Ajit Doval made videos of Biryani by paying money to the people of Kashmir! Nor did Adhir Ranjan Chaudhary say in the Lok Sabha without thinking that the issue of Kashmir has been under the supervision of the United Nations since 1948! These are all statements from which these traitor traitors broke into the country by taking money from Pakistan-based ISI. These statements have been given in very deliberate and planned ways to strengthen Pakistan's favor in the United Nations. Sarabjit was killed after being rotated in a Pakistani jail for decades due to anti-national campaign of anti-national journalists / journalists on the money of Pakistan and Congress, and Kulbhushan Jadhav is languishing in Pakistan jail till date. Ghulam Nabi must first answerтАж why did jihadis help the terrorists in the drama of kidnapping Rubia Saeed and to drive away Hindus from Kashmir? What did the Congress earn to get Hazratbal's blood seated in the bijjat government vehicles and cross the Pakistan border? For what purpose did the sister-daughters of Kashmiri Hindus deal with the Wahabis? What were the reasons that Nehru gifted Kashmiris 370 and 35a? How much of the trillion rupees that was spent on the Mufti and Abdullah family, who got what? What was the agenda of the biryani feasts of terrorists like Gilani and Yasin Malik? Common Kashmiris are Indians, who do not sell. You are sold and you defame them! People like Vinci, Quattrocchi, Sidhu, Mani Shankar are sold in the hands of China. And Digvijay sells Hindus as terrorists to save Pakistan's terrorists. Indira was sold, when the capture of Sam Manekshaw liberated 93,000 Pakistani soldiers without freeing Indian territory from Pakistan's occupation. Do not open your mouth. Right now you have torn your clothes just by running in the elections and do not take the test of patience of the public, lest next time you should not be completely clean as well as Gaddafi's effigy. Be careful! Now is the time, do not miss the time of atonement by joining the mainstream of the nation and playing a meaningful role on national issues

text: ┘Д┘Е╪з╪░╪з ╪к╪▓┘И╪м ╪з┘Д┘Ж╪и┘К ┘Е╪н┘Е╪п ╪╣╪п╪й  ╪▓┘И╪м╪з╪к 3тГг ╪к╪▒╪м┘Е╪й ╪з┘Д┘Д╪║╪й ╪з┘Д╪з┘Ж╪м┘Д┘К╪▓┘К╪й ЁЯСЗЁЯП╗  Why did Muhammad Marry Several Women? He married another widow, Umm Salama. Her previous husband, Abu Salama, was martyred in the Battle of Uhud, leaving behind four orphans. Umm Salama was pregnant at that time and was extremely distressed and very sad. Needless to say, she needed much support. After her delivery, `Umar proposed that the Prophet marry her. The Prophet accepted the proposal and married her.  What purpose can there be for a person of 54 to marry a widow with four orphans except love, mercy and compassion? There was another crucial factor in this marriage: Umm Salama was from the Bani Makhzum tribe, which was the tribe of IslamтАЩs arch enemies at that time, Abu Jahl and Khalid bin Walid. Though Abu Jahl never changed, Khalid later accepted Islam and became a brilliant military general. Once again, bringing influential and powerful tribes closer to Islam was one of the noble objectives of the ProphetтАЩs marriages.  He married a divorced woman, Zaynab, the daughter of Jahsh. She was married to Zayd bin Haritha, the freed slave of the Prophet. She was the cousin of the Prophet, being the daughter of his paternal aunt. Zayd divorced her and the Prophet married her when she was 38 years old. His marriage to Zaynab was aimed at emphasizing the invalidity of the age-old Arab practice of taking adopted sons as real sons. The marriage was divinely sanctioned, as stated in the QurтАЩan,  So when Zayd had no longer any need for her, We married her to you in order that there not be upon the believers any discomfort concerning the wives of their adopted sons when they no longer have need of them. (Al-Ahzab 33:37)  Umm Habiba was another widow whom the Prophet married. She was a daughter of Abu Sufyan who was a bitter enemy of Islam until his conversion later. She was initially married to `Ubaydullah, who was a companion of the Prophet. Both immigrated to Ethiopia, fleeing the persecution of the Meccans. `Ubaydullah became a Christian and later died there. Considering her very difficult situation, her father being an enemy of Islam and her husband a deserter, the Prophet sent an envoy to Negus, king of Ethiopia requesting to arrange a marriage with her. The king arranged the marriage and she was married to him when she was 36 or 37 years old. Like many of his marriages, his marriage to Umm Habiba resulted in bringing a major tribe of the Quraysh, Banu Abd al-Shams, towards Islam.

translated: Shaktahin Mughal was the nominal ruler of Delhi, but if there was any real ruler of that period, then he was a Hindu. The boundaries of fire that were ignited by Maharashtra to protect the country, religion and caste by Shivaji Maharaj spread beyond Maharashtra and reached the borders of the country. Look at the most interesting golden truth of history, that the matriarch Aurangzeb used to call the heroic Shivaji Maharaj as a mountain rat, the descendants of the same Shivaji, had decorated the descendants of the same Aurangzeb as "Maharajadhiraj" and "Wazire Mutalik". The horse of Prithvi Raj Chauhan, the last Hindu king on the banks of the Sindh river, reached the same Sindh river after many centuries, if someone reached the saffron flag, it was a Hindu Veer Maratha horse. From the banks of Sindh to Madurai, the Maratha chieftains from the Konkan to Bengal used to collect taxes as chauth from all the provinces, suppressing rebellions against them from place to place, punishing the Siddis of Janjira for corrupting Hindu temples. Used to give, deservedly punished by the Portuguese for forcibly converting Hindus to Christianity, the British government which considered itself invincible and world conqueror Rathon were used to tax the maritime trade, was a revival of Hindu shrines and temples in place in the country that make Hindus purify again the Hindus made forced Muslims, Muslims destroyed. During the rule of the Marathas, the saffron flag was again waving throughout the Aryavrata nation and Vedas, Gau and Brahmins were protected. Not to write this golden rule of Hindus for more than a century by English writers and their psychic slave communist writers is messing with history, if not more. We did not forget that "A nation that forgets its ancient glory, it loses the pillar of its nationality." In reverse, Ganga Baha di Veer Shivaji was born in 1626. During his period, there was a Muslim kingdom in every part of the country. Occasionally, if a Hindu king struggled, his defeat would corrupt the Hindu temples, in which the Hindus were humiliated by sacrificing the cow. Raising the glory of their harem by raising Hindu girls was like proving yourself religious. In such a tortured environment, the struggle of Veer Shivaji was nothing less than a boon for Hindus. The ears of the Hindu people were tired for centuries to hear that a Hindu conquered a Muslim. Shivaji started taking control of the kilo of Bijapur Sultanate from 1772. Within a few years, he targeted the Mughal kilo with his sword. Aurangzeb sent his great nobles to defeat Shivaji, but all failed. Finally, by deceit, Shivaji was called to Agra and imprisoned, where Shivaji escaped with his cleverness. Aurangzeb could do nothing except repent. Shivaji established the Hindu state and the public beautified him with Chhatrapati. Shivaji's premature death could spread his kingdom to Maharashtra. Aurangzeb had two options before Shambha ji, either take death or accept Islam. The son of Veer Shivaji endured death by enduring extreme atrocities, but did not betray his soul by embracing Islam and watered the Hindu freedom tree with his blood and made it green. After Shivaji's death, Aurangzeb thought to destroy the Maratha kingdom, but the Marathas presented the ideal which the Hindu caste desperately needed. They abandoned the fort, etc. and took the path of mountains and forests. For the first time in the world, the Marathas started a guerrilla war. The Marathas would come from the jungles at a gallant pace and kill them fiercely, looting the Mughal camp and fleeing back to the jungles. Relaxed in alcoholism, the Mughal army was nowhere ready for this type of war. After 20 years of war with the Marathas in the Deccan, Aurangzeb grew old and became disillusioned, his army of about 3 lakhs became the gras of time. All his trust-worthy chieftains either died or became old. But he could not overcome the war raiding the Marathas. Readers can estimate the victory of Marathas from the fact that in the same number of organized army as Shivaji's small unorganized state, Shivaji could win 10 times as large organized state. Finally Aurangzeb also died in 1805, but till then Rajputs in Punjab, Sikhs, Rajputs in Rajasthan, Rajputs in Bundelkhand, Chhatrasal, Mathura, Rajputs in Bharatpur, etc., had played bricks of the Mughal Sultanate. The Mughals Sultanate was so weakened by the Marathas entangling Aurangzeb in the Deccan that it later collapsed like cards due to a mutual battle between its descendants. All credit goes to Veer Shivaji for shedding this reverse Ganga. History of caste pride larger than selfishness is a witness to the fact that the Mughal rule in India was established only due to lack of unity of Hindus. From the time of Akbar, Hindus were fighting for their own countrymen, their own community for Akbar. Aurangzeb's biggest mistake in life was that he considered insulting and started insulting the Rajputs, which led to another Rajputs destroying the Mughal Empire. The spirit of fraternity got a chance to flourish and brother embraced brother by sacrificing his selfishness and mutual differences. The Marathas, led by Shivaji's sons Rajaram and Tarabai, started a struggle with the fort of Jinji. Khandoblal, the general of the Marathas, died    тЬН

translated: Doubt is getting deeper! In most of the cities of North India, processions are going out with hysterical slogans! And some of the slogans are sounded and written on the placards that ... тЧП 'We should not change jobs', тЧП' We will stay hungry but Modiji, take revenge ', тЧП' Stop the general election, Pakistan Hit two ', тЧП' Mother of Pakistan ... ', тЧП' Save the country; Bring Modiji again '...! School children are also taking out processions with placards. These include children of Saraswati Shishu temples as well as children of private schools in a big way! From the management of these private schools, BJP leaders are asking for a procession! In these processions, slogans are being raised to describe Muslims as traitors and Pakistanis! Efforts are being made to deliberately incite tension and create terror while going through the settlements of the Muslim population! 'Zee News', 'Aaj Tak', 'Republic TV,' Sudarshan, etc. channels are spewing poison day and night! Hacks cyber campaigners and cyber goons have become active! Rumors and fascist propaganda have been spread through WhatsApp etc. Attacks on Kashmiri students and shopkeepers in Dehradun, Udaipur, Bihar and many cities of the country had begun on the second day of Pulwama! Muslim settlements in Jammu were attacked the same day! From the very next day, the BJP leaders including Modi had gathered in Smoke Dhar rallies. Many BJP leaders have done road shows with the dead bodies of the martyred soldiers of CRPF! Satanic intentions crush. * ЁЯЩПЁЯЪйЁЯЗоЁЯЗ│ЁЯФ▒ЁЯП╣ЁЯРЪЁЯХЙ   Its basis was the treaties made with the Muslim League of the Congress in which the League always had a hand. * Prediction of war with China .. * In 1954, the then Prime Minister Nehru gave the mantra of Panchsheel, a five-point program on the basis of which India could live peacefully with its neighbors. But Veer Savarkar noticed flaws in Panchsheel and gave a sharp warning to Nehru. He said that even if the way China tried to annex Tibet, it would be a huge mistake if Nehru believed in luring China with such spells. Such weak policies will increase China's appetite and not be surprised if China tries to grab India's land in future. Eight years later, he was proved right and China attacked India and captured a large part of it which connected India to Central Asia. * Assam warning and Savarkar's unique debate with Nehru. * When Muslims from East Bengal (present-day Bangladesh) started migrating to Assam's Brahmaputra Valley in search of livelihood, Savarkar had said that he would in future Pose a threat to the north-eastern frontier region. At that time Nehru said, "Nature is against zero." How can we prevent people from living in vacant spaces. "In response to this statement, Savarkar said," Nehru knows very little about the atmosphere. Nature is also against poisonous elements. тАЭSavarkar was proved right. Today 35 percent of Assam's population is Muslim. Sufis came there after adopting Islam. The Muslims who were once 'liberals', today, under the influence of most Indian Wahhabi Tanjim like Deoband and Ahle-Hadith, have adopted the Wahhabi thinking, whose global Islamic outlook is a danger bell. The situation has improved a bit since the arrival of the nationalist government in the state in 2016, but before 2016 the Hindu community could not celebrate its festivals in many Muslim dominated villages. * World War II and militarization .. * At the beginning of World War II in 1939, Savarkar noticed that the Indian Army had more Muslims than Hindus. He was looking at the weak Congress treaties on the Muslim issue with the Muslim League at the time and was realizing that Hindus could become weak in the battle of united India in the coming years. Therefore, he considered the Second World War a divine boon for the Hindus and said that they should prepare themselves militarily. Consequently, millions of Hindus joined the army during the war in the next six years. The Muslim community was horrified to see this and in 1944 a statement was issued on its behalf that Muslim interests were jeopardized due to the large number of Hindus joining the army. The Muslim League was seen to be partitioning the country in the near future and therefore when it saw the number of Hindus in the Indian Army being more than the Muslims, it was a threat. At that time, the Congress called Savarkar's initiative 'pro-British'. But revisiting today, we have to think what would have happened if there were less Hindus in the army at the time of Partition. Probably at that time, India would have been forced to adopt a second division, as Pakistan would have attacked and conquered the frontier areas of Rajasthan and Gujarat on the basis of its superior military prowess, as it did during the 1948 occupation of a part of Kashmir. * Anti-Hindu view and secular silence .. * A memorable experience I want to share, when the pan-Islamic and anti-Hindu and anti-India views of the Wahhabis opened my eyes. At that time I was working in Gujarat. On January 1, 2006, at the Mehdi Nawaz Jung Hall in Aurangabad, a quarrel of Jamaat-Islami and Muslim Personal Law Board member SQ A Ilyas of India shook me deep within. Ilyas is the father of Omar Khalid, who raised the slogan 'Pieces, pieces ..' in JNU. I had been tracking Ilyas's views since that time in 2003. At that time, I had read an interview of him on 'WebManch Reidmail' which gave a glimpse of his fundamentalist Islamic views. In that interview, in Delhi, he was asked for his views on sticking advertisements of 'end of nationalism, restore Khilafat' by SIMI elements. Ilyas's reply was, "There is nothing wrong with this." Nationalism is a fascist idea and even Gandhi and the Congress had advocated Khilafat. "So, when I read that Ilyas is going to give a speech under the aegis of JEI of Ahmedabad, I reached there. In the beginning of his argument, Ilyas said, "Islam has been here (in India) for 800 years and yet we have not been able to get everyone here to accept Islam." The poor and exploited of this land have been waiting for hundreds of years to adopt Islam, but we have failed in this task. Why?   ЁЯЩП  ЁЯЪй  ЁЯФ▒  ЁЯП╣  ЁЯРЪ  ЁЯХЙ

translated: * Internal supporters of terrorism * Sometimes even the people of Pakistan would have thought that we had fought 3 wars with Hindustan for no reason and would have become a character of laughter in the world, or they would have thought that if we had not hurried to take Pakistan then today Would have made the whole of India Pakistan. Yes friends, you must be feeling a little strange after reading, but the reality cannot be turned away. There is no need for any Pakistan or China to ruin India, nor is there any external bus to harm India. In order to reach this noble cause, there are many revolutionary, liberal, secular groups sitting in India. The present-day Kulbhushan case in the International Court of Justice is a recent example. When Pakistan itself did not find any evidence that could prove Kulbhushan Jadhav to be an Indian spy, in such a difficult time, it was useful for him to write an article written by three great journalists from India, which was shown in the court by the Pakistani lawyer See, true Indian journalists themselves believe that Kulbhushan Jadhav is a spy. Tell me what to say about such Indians. History is witness that Sugriva has played an important role in killing Ravana and killing Vibhishan and Bali, it is seen recurring here too. This intellectual group sitting in India, in the guise of virtue, constitution, truth, freedom and modernism, is able to distort the subjects in such a way that you too will be thinking for a time that the matter is right. But you will not be allowed to know about the wrong business that will be run under the cover of that right thing. Recently, while evaluating the terrorist attacks on Indian soldiers in Pulwama on 14 February, some Mahatma people started saying that this is a failure of the Government of India. Our soldiers do not get good food, the government does not even give pension to CRPF soldiers. Now you will hear that the matter is correct, it is also true. But think carefully how with carelessness your attention was diverted from the issue of terrorism towards lack of facilities. Just think, can terrorism be justified due to lack of facilities? Doesn't giving soldiers good food cause death in a bomb blast? Is not giving a pension a terrorist event? It is a matter of thinking. The attack of these Makar Kutarkists is not from one side, they try to divert us from reality by taking us in different directions. Some of the great people of these groups made a deep assessment of the castes of the martyrs and found out this valuable information about how many people of which caste were martyred, and by their research, they started to prove how deep the roots of Manuwad are in India. If you ever ask these casteists the caste or religion of terrorism, then all the dyed jackals of this country will speak in one voice - terrorism has no religion. Avoid such sly people, save your society, your country too. The army standing on the outskirts can compete with the enemies outside, but we will have to deal with these enemies inside. The great people who sacrificed themselves for the unity, integrity, freedom of the country, wherever they are watching us today, must be saying just this - We have brought the kayak out of the storm, keep this country for my children. .

translated: The name of the attacker is Azad Mohammed ... Muslim. He rents out his house to Veeru (Hindu), Veeru was accompanied by his wife Sunita and son Akash and a young daughter. Sunita's daughter was playing on the terrace. Water fell down from the water bottle placed there, which fell on Azad Mohammed standing below ... Mohammed started abusing the child. When mother Sunita came out of the house, Azad started quarreling with her about this. The quarrel grew so much that Azad Mohammad stabbed the knife 50 times in 45 secondsтАж mother, father is killed, son is seriously injuredтАж in hospital. The root cause of the quarrel - the falling of a little girl. Panic throughout the area since the incident. A year ago, Dr. Narang was playing cricket with his child in the courtyard of the house with air-filled hair, suddenly the ball goes out and he sees 4-5 boys passing by. Boys are Muslims. A quarrel ensues. Later, the entire group of Muslims comes and kills Dr. Narang. Panic throughout the area since the incident. Let's go a while ago in Gurdaspur, Punjab, a Hindu boy named Sunny is beaten to death by three Muslims. Panic throughout the area since the incident. Let us go a little further, the religion of a Mumbai boy is askedтАж he becomes silentтАж he is asked forcibly (beaten up), he is killed by burning oil by putting oil on being a Hindu. Panic throughout the area since the incident. There are just four incidents written above and if needed, I will give it ... Maybe it will take a whole year to write and note it. Well come to the point, what is this and why is this .... Yes, there is a common thing in all four that everyone's videos are made and viral. Who's gonna make it? Nobody knowsтАж or knows and does not come forward? It can be any one thingтАж but I can say 100% all this is done deliberately under a thoughtful strategy. By reading Islam, you can understand very well 1. Do jihad (terrorism) with the kafiro and profiteers, strictly abide by them - Quran 9:73 2. Keep fighting the kafiro who are around you - Quran 9: 123 3 Fight with those who deny Allah, and persecute them, Strictly abide by them, their whereabouts are the most powerful - Quran 66: 9 is most important now 4. We will create terror in the hearts of those who deny (non-Muslims) - Quran 3 : 151 5. Always keep army and power Go .. Fear the enemies of Allah and fear others besides these, whom you do not even know. Allah knows them, whatever you spend in the way of Allah, you will be fully repaid, there will be no injustice to you.

translated: * Lessons for Hindus * Very few people probably know that the only Jewish country in the world, #Israel, is celebrating its "50th Victory Day". But what happened on this day 50 years ago? There is a war opening the eyes of Hinduists and seculars of India. Just as Pakistan was separated from India in 1949, Israel was separated from Palestine. The only difference was that Pakistan was the result of the treason of the Muslims and the rights of Israelis Jews because Palestine was once the entire Central Asia of Jews. But as Islam spread, Israel shrank. Israel became Israel in 1947 and Egypt, Syria, Jordan, Iraq, Lebanon, Algeria, Kuwait, Libya, Morocco, Pakistan and Tunisia all attacked Muslim countries together on 4 June 1967. At that time 20% of the Muslims in Israel were loving Israelis for 20 years. But as soon as they came to know that God sent troops from Iraq and Kuwait to eradicate Israel, they started riots in Israel and created a civil war. The Israeli poor was badly trapped because the 20 years he had been made had not been completed, the army was not enough and the Muslims sitting inside Israel were more excited, so the police administration was busy fighting them. Poor lonely Israel still jumped into the war, Israeli Muslims bombed a business building on the first day. Israel did not cry in response, but it threw the grenade directly. Now the patience of the Jews was broken, their citizens also started jumping in this fight. For four days, the Israeli government was focused only on Israeli Muslims, although in the meantime they pushed back the Iraq and Libyan forces. The army was fighting outside, never seen such a scene of civilian, patriotic and unity in history. In 4 days, the Jews had completely crushed the spies of their home and sent them to Jannat, now their civilian armies came to the border and by the end of the sixth day all the Islamic countries had fled showing their backs. Israel had won this war. Now thousands of lessons are hidden for India in this war, you think that this war went on for 6 days, Israel took 4 days to overcome the Muslims inside it, while it threw the people outside in the garbage in 2 days. In 1965, two years before the Israeli war, India fought with Pakistan, in which Muslim soldiers of the Muslim Regiment of India refused to fight against Pakistan. Hope you are able to compare the same mindset between Muslims of India and Israel. But the only difference was that Muslims in India could not muster the courage to commit riots because their population was only 6% in 1950 when the same population in Israel had become 20%, so they committed riots there. But be careful now that this population is not 6% but 25% in India, you must have understood what I want to say next. The second message of this war is that the Jews understood the true color of the Muslims. Israel imposed strict laws directly on the Muslims. Treason was given to them as a death sentence, ЁЯЪй  and now ЁЯЪй  the last message that you still wake up is that the Jews have told that victory in war is not an affront to your population but is in your unity. Learn to unite your people instead of cursing . * Vedika * Ajay Shri Ram

translated: * Video of suspect in Sri Lankan bomb ЁЯСА  blasts case * A video ЁЯУ╣  of a few seconds before the attack of the assailant who carried out the suicide bomb attack on the church in Sri Lanka has surfaced in which he entered the crowded church First it is seen placing a hand on the head of a girl. In Sri Lanka, more than 321 people died in the serial blasts on Easter on Sunday. The video surfaced on Tuesday. In the video that surfaced from the St. Sebastian Catholic Church in Negombo, on the west coast of Sri Lanka, a bearded man is seen carrying a large backpack on his back, who is seen putting his hand on the head of a girl standing outside the church, as he Was about to hit the baby girl. In the video, the girl is seen with a person. The suspect then walks calmly into the church through a nearby door, where a large number of people are seen standing for Sunday prayers. The prayer was on when the terrorist blew himself up with a bomb. The explosion in this church killed 93 people. The terrorist organization ISIS claimed responsibility for these attacks on Tuesday. Seven suicide bombers who carried out it were identified. In a statement through its propaganda committee 'Amaq', according to the Site Intelligence Group, which monitors jihadi activities, ISIS said, "Two days ago those who attacked Sri Lanka by targeting the citizens and Christians of coalition member countries , He was associated with the Islamic State group. What is Swamiji saying? Brother Shafi, Brother Sirajur Rahman How well do Motivation speak in Telugu? How many moral stories are being taught! Who says such a good thing? Wish you had that in mind! Of course, you do not. * Do not be fooled by Hindus. * These two are from UIRC ie UNIVERSAL ISLAMIC RESEARCH CENTER. This company was started in 2007 in Hyderabad. Each company gets their AIMS & OBJECTS in the application before they are registered. They are clearly included on their official website. _AIMS & OBJECTS OF UIRC_ * The primary aim of the UIRC is to clear up the misconceptions of non-Muslims and the proper presentation of Islam in the local language. Among the programs, the newly reformed Muslims and the Organizing Tarbiyat Programs to enable them to practice Islam and the Da'yees acquiring good knowledge. Nowhere does it say that this organization works for Muslims. It is exclusively for Hindus and Christians. Four fairy tales, four influential stories, speak sweetly in Telugu ... They are trying to bring us down to three in order to see how well Abba is saying ... Speaking sweetly, they are trying to take us to Islam. (Control of the senses from bad addictions), Wisdom (putting the intellect in the best thoughts), Vidya (Vedadi Samyak knowledge), Satya (observance of truth), Akrodha (non-anger / renunciation of violence instinct) There are signs of religion. * _ If a person in any corner of the world practices these signs of religion, he is religious. #рдлрд░рд╡рд░реА_15_2019  рднрд╛рд░рдд рдиреЗ рдкреБрд▓рд╡рд╛рдорд╛ рдореЗрдВ рд╕реАрдЖрд░рдкреАрдПрдл рдЬрд╡рд╛рдиреЛрдВ рдкрд░ рдЖрддреНрдордШрд╛рддреА рдЖрддрдВрдХреА рд╣рдорд▓реЗ рдХреЗ рд╡рд┐рд░реЛрдз рдореЗрдВ рдкрд╛рдХрд┐рд╕реНрддрд╛рди рдХреЗ рдЦрд┐рд▓рд╛рдл рдХрдбрд╝рд╛ рдПрдХреНрд╢рди рд▓реЗрддреЗ рд╣реБрдП рдкрд╛рдХрд┐рд╕реНрддрд╛рди рд╕реЗ рдореЛрд╕реНрдЯ рдлреЗрд╡рд░реНрдб рдиреЗрд╢рди (рдПрдордПрдлрдПрди) рдХрд╛ рджрд░реНрдЬрд╛ рд╡рд╛рдкрд╕ рд▓реЗрдиреЗ рдХреА рдШреЛрд╖рдгрд╛ рдХреА рд╣реИ. рд╣рдорд▓реЗ рдХреЗ рдорджреНрджреЗрдирдЬрд░ 15 рдлрд░рд╡рд░реА 2019 рдХреЛ рдкреАрдПрдо рдореЛрджреА рдХреА рдЕрдзреНрдпрдХреНрд╖рддрд╛ рдореЗрдВ рд╕реБрд░рдХреНрд╖рд╛ рдкрд░ рдХреИрдмрд┐рдиреЗрдЯ рд╕рдорд┐рддрд┐ (CCS) рдХреА рдмреИрдардХ рд╣реБрдИ. рдмреИрдардХ рдореЗрдВ It is good, whether you oppose democracy or support it is your own right, but who are you supporting by opposing Modi, this is a very serious question, so the decision must be made seriously! Are Mulayam, Lalu, Mayawati, Sonia, Rahul, Kejriwal, Mamta Banerjee, Leftists all better than Narendra Modi or their record is better? Does the tenure of Mamata Banerjee, Akhilesh etc. seem better than Narendra Modi's Chief Minister's term in Gujarat? If you want to compare, then take a look in a small city of Gujarat and then visit the capital of these other states! At the time of entering politics, both Lalu and Mulayam's house was such that they did not have the money to buy bicycles and lanterns, these caste leaders are today billionaires, Ram Gopal roams on chartered planes, Shivpal Where did so much money come from in Audi, are these people better than Narendra Modi? Sonia's son-daughter and son-in-law are all billionaires today, are they better than Narendra Modi? Are leftists who ruled Bengal for 35 years better than Narendra Modi? Five years ago, Kejriwal duped the people of Delhi by running an advertisement, WIFI, CCTV, 150 colleges, 500 schools, is this better than mushroom Narendra Modi? When Mayawati came out to do politics and was Kashiram's partner, she did not have money to burn in her house, campaigned with cycle, today her sandal also comes from the plane, her brother has 497 companies, is this Narendra Modi is better than ? Those who oppose Modi, oppose it, but decide whom to support, if there is a better option then tell, think a little about the country also, how much to waste, how much to loot? translated: On 14 February, internationals were killed when 40 brave soldiers were killed in a cowardly suicide attack by Pakistan-funded terrorist organization Jaish-e-Mohammed, targeting the caravan of buses carrying Veer Ranbankur of our border in Pulwama, Kashmir. There is panic in me. All the big and small nations not only strongly condemned this but also raised their voice against terrorism and confirmed to stand with India, but kept the terror sitting in the neighborhood, the nursery of terrorism, the factory remained, open for a long time. By giving shelter to common terrorist leaders, the language of Pakistan, which was growing Pal Poshkar, opened after five days. Listening to what the Prime Minister said, the ridiculous, childish reason for the blistering and delayed opening - written by his army and intelligence agency - of the King of Saudi Arabia - it seems that Pakistan's reins With no backbone, the prankster has come into the hands of the leader. The ideology of the leadership of that country is completely mortgaged by the army and intelligence agency ISI. Which is a source of spreading unrest, violence and poison of petty communalism all over the world by growing the crop of terrorism. Such sneaky leadership is neither good for Pakistan nor for neighboring nations. It seems to be the misfortune of the people of the neighboring country that they have found such immature, short-sighted and impractical leaders who perhaps do not even know the maturity and humanistic outlook required for the broader gamut of foreign policy or the devious, inhuman rites. Are his identity. However, this situation seems to be a direct example of his mental bankruptcy and ax running on his feet. Ironically, even in India, there are such pacific Jayachand, the cancers of Indian developing politics, who talk about giving Pakistan an opportunity to protect its political interests and survival in Kashmir. Somebody has rightly said - Pakistan's greatest strength is not its atomic bomb ....... traitors living in India, who keep trying to support it by nurturing and supporting it. These lines of a popular film song from about fifty years ago also fit exactly in this context. It is necessary to say one thing that we need to be careful with the guards of this country and mention some other gimmicky eagles painted in the same color from the traitors hidden in our house. We also have clap-thongs, cross-border sportsmen and junkies who have become extremely opportunistic leaders, who, despite seeing Pakistan's direct involvement, refrain from uttering a few words in opposition to Pakistan for this terrorist incident. . There are no less people who are cooking up the reputation of getting rid of all the problems through dialogue, stuck in the paranoia of cricket, even in this atmosphere of satvik fury and sarcasm that reinforces national loyalty. We also have no shortage of pseudo-secularists of such apathy who are becoming the object of laughter and anger among the public by propagating ideas different from our mature foreign policy. Sadly when the Chief Minister of this opportunistic clown minister - leader Piddi ji makes his statement openly against Pakistan even in the assembly, standing with the anger of the entire country. At the same time, this less intelligent cricketer, jester, does not get tired of asking to sit and talk with Pakistan. Yet the fact is that the national leadership of this party does not take any action against it, ignoring all the ridiculous accolades of this clown. Not only this, in the comedy show of TV where Mr. Shriman Basir keeps clapping his feet, his main character Kapil Sharma has also become the object of people's anger by speaking the language of Siddu. I feel that the common man should now teach these two Pakistan-based jester a lesson by taking a pledge not to watch this comedy show. When our strong-willed government can make the voice of the common man its voice and force it to kneel by putting restrictions on Pakistan, then we (ie the general public) should also stay here and let these few clowns of our homeland immersed in Pakistan By boycotting them altogether.

translated: * ЁЯСЙ  ЁЯСЙ19 enlightened Muslims wrote тЬН  a letter to PM, praised his attitude towards minorities ЁЯСМ  * Some people may call Modi government as anti-minority especially anti-Muslim community, but 19 enlightened people working in the field of education, society and culture A group of Muslim people wrote a letter to Modi praising his attitude towards minorities. Also wished the success of the new term of the government in the month of Ramadan. The special thing is that Kamal Farooqui, who heads this group, is a member of the Muslim Personal Law Board, which is opposing the Modi government's decision to ban triple talaq. Similarly, in the group, Jamiat Ulema-e-Hind general secretary Mahmood Madani, Delhi Minorities Commission Chairman Dr. Zafarul Islam Khan, Progressive Muslim Social Circle Jaipur president and former IAS AR Khan, former chairman of Haj Committee of India and former Delhi Chief Commissioner of Income Tax Kaiser Shamim, President of World Educational and Development and CEO of Anjum Islam Mumbai Shabi Ahmed, Modern Public Skills of IITian and Mau L'president тЬи  Shahid Anwar, educator and author Klimul Hafiz A total of 19 people, including. text: рднрд╛рд░рддреАрдп рд╕реЗрдирд╛ рдиреЗ рдХреА рдПрдХ рдФрд░ рд╕рд░реНрдЬрд┐рдХрд▓ рд╕реНтАНрдЯреНрд░рд╛рдЗрдХ, рдореНтАНрдпрд╛рдВрдорд╛рд░ рд╕реЗрдирд╛ рдХреЗ рд╕рд╛рде рдорд┐рд▓рдХрд░ рдЗрд╕ рдСрдкрд░реЗрд╢рди рдХреЛ рдЕрдВрдЬрд╛рдо рджрд┐рдпрд╛  ЁЯСЙЁЯП╜рдЖрддрдВрдХрд╡рд╛рдж рдХреЗ рдЦрд┐рд▓рд╛рдл рднрд╛рд░рдд рдХрд╛ рд╕рдЦреНтАНрдд рд░реБрдЦ рдХрд╛рдпрдо рд╣реИ. рдкреАрдУрдХреЗ рдореЗрдВ рднрд╛рд░рддреАрдп рд╡рд╛рдпреБрд╕реЗрдирд╛ рдХреА рддрд░рдл рд╕реЗ рдЬреИрд╢-рдП-рдореЛрд╣рдореНтАНрдордж рдХреЗ рдард┐рдХрд╛рдиреЛрдВ рдкрд░ рдХреА рдЧрдИ рд╣рд╡рд╛рдИ рдХрд╛рд░реНрд░рд╡рд╛рдИ рдХреЗ рдХреБрдЫ рджрд┐рди рдмрд╛рдж рд╣реА рднрд╛рд░рддреАрдп рд╕реЗрдирд╛ рдиреЗ рдЕрдм рдореНтАНрдпрд╛рдВрдорд╛рд░ рд╕реАрдорд╛ рдкрд░ рдореМрдЬреВрдж рдЖрддрдВрдХрд┐рдпреЛрдВ рдХреЗ рдХрдИ рдард┐рдХрд╛рдиреЛрдВ рдХреЛ рдиреЗрд╕реНтАНрддреЛрдирд╛рдмреВрдж рдХрд░ рджрд┐рдпрд╛. рднрд╛рд░рддреАрдп рд╕реЗрдирд╛ рдиреЗ рдореНтАНрдпрд╛рдВрдорд╛рд░ рд╕реЗрдирд╛ рдХреЗ рд╕рд╛рде рдорд┐рд▓рдХрд░ рдЗрд╕ рдСрдкрд░реЗрд╢рди рдХреЛ рдЕрдВрдЬрд╛рдо рджрд┐рдпрд╛. The Myanmar rebel group Arakan Army had built new bases on the Mizoram border, targeting the Kaladan project. The Arakan Army was trained by the Kachin Independence Army up to North Border China. According to sources, the rebels traveled 1000 km from the areas adjacent to Arunachal to the ЁЯСЙ  Mizoram border. According to sources, a 2-week long joint Indo-Myanmar operation was conducted against the Rohingya terror group Arakan Army and the Naga terrorist group NSCN (K). translated: * Prime Minister ЁЯСд  Modi addressed the Parliament ЁЯЧг  of Maldives, expressed ЁЯШб  concern over terrorism * Prime Minister Modi today addressed the Maldives Parliament Majlis. In the Maldives Parliament, the PM said that India and every Indian was with you and will be with you for the strengthening of democracy in Maldives. The motto of my government is the development of all and trust of all. This is the basis of my government's foreign policy not only in India, but in the world. Neighbors are ЁЯУ╣  our priority and Maldives' priority is natural. Watch video ЁЯУ╣ http://v.duta.us/SPb3GwAA PM Modi said that today there is no place where terrorism does not kill an innocent by showing its terrible form. They have no banks, no institutions and no factories. Yet they do not lack money and weapons. Who gives them this? State sponsorship of terrorism is the biggest threat. People are still making the mistake of distinguishing Good Terrorism and Bad Terrorism. It is imperative for all humanitarian forces to unite to properly deal with the challenge of terrorism. PM Modi said that the biggest challenge of the world leadership is to deal with it, just as the world community held world-wide conferences on environmental hazards, why can't it be about terrorism. I would expect all major countries to organize a global conference on terrorism within a time frame. translated: * Excessive publicity and politics done on surgical strike: former army officer who keeps a live watch on the operation * A former army officer associated with the operation on India's surgical strike on terrorists entering Pakistan's border said that initial excitement over its success It was natural but it was hyped excessively. A former army officer associated with the operation on India's surgical strike on terrorists entering Pakistan's border said that the initial excitement over the success of the surgical strike was natural but it was excessively publicized, which was inappropriate. Lt Gen DS Hooda (Retd) said that "I think this matter was overstated." Army operation was necessary and we had to do it. Now how much should it be politicized, whether it is right or wrong, it is a question that should be asked by politicians. Explain that when the surgical strike was done on the Line of Control (LoC) on September 29, 2016, Lt Gen DS Hooda (Retd) was the Commander of the Northern Army. Actually, Lt General Hooda (retired) was watching the live video feed of the surgical strike at that time. Which was launched in retaliation for the Uri terrorist attack. Please tell that 19 Indian soldiers were killed by Pakistani terrorists in Uri attack. The army had said that the Special Forces attacked them strongly and brought them to Nakusan, who were waiting to enter the Indian border. The retired army officer attended the Military Literature Festival (MLF) in Lt. General Hooda Chandigarh and there he said that I planned Special Forces to take revenge from the terrorists (Surgical Strike) within less than two weeks of the Uri terrorist attack. Was approved. https://khabar.ndtv.com/news/india/lt-general-ds-hooda-says-too-much-hype-over-surgical-strike-1959579?type=news&id=1959579&category=india

translated: As a child, a rajjan used to live in our neighborhood. Chacha was a Charasi and often used to quarrel with someone. Matcha was very sensible in comparison to Chacha. She always used to explain Chacha and also to the local people. She cries about being a drug addict and tells how Chacha has become addicted to his own relatives by losing his property and property, so he should be moved with pity. Whenever Chacha used to beat and beat someone, Chachi would stop the quarrel and would take Chacha home by persuading him. The next day, then he would kill someone. Slowly, one thing became clear to the local people that whenever Chacha was beaten by someone, Chachi always used to grab the front man during intervening time, cling to him and start explaining. Taking advantage of this, Chacha not only gave two punches and roots to the front (because he was bound by the grip of the chachi), but also used to kill and disappear from the spot. Chachi then begins a cry-beating-explaining phase. A pattern began to appear. Then one day during one such quarrel, the front man, having tried to explain and cling to it, properly crushed the chachi. The next time Chacha fought, Chachi did not appear. The raws were also well crushed. There was peace in the locality after that day. No matter how much Chacha was drunk, he did not get involved with anyone. Presently, some Liberal / media persons and politicians are playing the same Chachi. At the time of an incident of terror, they first start telling the circumstances of the terrorist, how much blame the government and society have in becoming a terrorist, and then they bind the country with their voice to make people the root of terror. I myself understand my mistake. On the other hand, terrorists are setting their next target. Overall, there is no scope for improvement of the raw without beating the raw. Sincerely with a friend

translated: * ЁЯСЙ  UP CM Yogi Adityanath's disputed statement ЁЯЧг  told the Indian Army, 'Modi ji's ЁЯСо  army' * Controversy statements of leaders are continuing among the Lok Sabha election enthusiasts. UP Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath is also no exception. UP CM Yogi, who has given such statements many times before, has now called the Indian Army as 'Modi ji's army', on which controversy has arisen. The Congress has slammed the BJP for its politics over the issue of the army being always safe for the country and asked Yogi to apologize for his statement. UP CM Yogi Adityanath was addressing an election meeting in Ghaziabad on Sunday, when he attacked the Congress on the issue of terrorism and called it a 'party sympathetic to terrorists'. Watch the second tweet and video ЁЯУ╣  here- He did not stop here, he gave 'Modi ji's army' by not giving credit to the Indian Army for 'teaching a lesson' to the terrorists and Pakistan. Yogi, the attacker against the Congress, while addressing the public meeting said, "Congressmen used to feed Biryani to the terrorists, Modi ji's army shoots and shells the terrorists." The need is that the population of Muslims should be controlled at present based on the remaining percentage of Hindu-Muslims at the time of Partition. Such as the prohibition of one child for Muslims and the exemption of up to 4 children for Hindus. Only then will existence be safe.

text: The Hindus of the Kashmir Valley, were forced to flee the Kashmir valley as a result of being targeted by JKLF and Islamist insurgents during late 1989 and early 1990.[4][5] Of the approximately 300,000[6][7][8] to 600,000[9][10] Hindus living in the Kashmir Valley in 1990 only 2,000тАУ3,000 remain there in 2016.[11]  Exodus of Kashmiri Hindus Part of Insurgency in Jammu and Kashmir Jammu-Kashmir-Ladakh.svg Kashmir Valley in color green Date 1989 and afterwards[1] Location Kashmir Valley Goals Islamisation, ethnic cleansing, independence from India, merger with Pakistan, Sharia law[2] Methods Rape, targeted killing, murder, threats, kidnapping Resulted in Mass Migration of Kashmiri Hindus Casualties Death(s) 200-1,341[3] According to the Indian government, more than 62,000 families are registered as Kashmiri refugees including some Sikh families.[12] Most families were resettled in Jammu, National Capital Region surrounding Delhi and other neighbouring states.[13]  Background  Edit Under the 1975 accord, Sheikh Abdullah agreed to measures previously undertaken by the central government in Jammu and Kashmir to integrate the state into India.[14] Sociologist Farrukh Faheem states that it was met with hostility among people of Kashmir and laid the groundwork for the future insurgency.[15] Those opposed to it included Jamaat-e-Islami Kashmir and People's League in Indian Jammu and Kashmir, and Jammu Kashmir Liberation Front (JKLF) based in Azad Kashmir.[16] Since the mid-1970s, communalist rhetoric was being exploited in the state for votebank politics. Islamization of Kashmir began during 1980's when Abdullah Government changed the names of about 2500 villages from their native names to new Islamic names. The Sheikh also started delivering communal speeches in mosques similar to his speeches in 1930's. Additionally, he referred Kashmiri Pandits as тАЬmukhbirтАЭ or informers of the Indian government.[17][18]  ISI's initial attempts to create unrest in Kashmir against the Indian government were unsuccessful until it started growing in late-1980s.[19] The Afghan jihad against the Soviets, the Islamic Revolution in Iran and the armed struggle of the Sikhs in Punjab against the Indian state became sources of inspiration for large numbers of Kashmiri Muslim youth.[20][21] Both the pro-Independence JKLF and the pro-Pakistan Islamist groups including Jamaat-e-Islami Kashmir mobilised the fast growing anti-Indian sentiments among the Kashmiri population. The year of 1984 saw a pronounced rise in terrorist violence in Kashmir. When the JKLF militant Maqbool Bhat was executed in February 1984, strikes and protests by Kashmiri nationalists broke out in the region, where large number of Kashmiri youth participated in widespread anti-India demonstrations, which faced heavy handed reprisals by the state forces.[22][23]  Critics of the then Chief Minister, Farooq Abdullah, charged that Abdullah was losing control. His visit to Pakistan administered Kashmir during then became an embarrassment, where according to Hashim Qureshi, he shared a platform with JKLF . Though Abdullah asserted that he went on behalf of Indira Gandhi and his father, so that sentiments there could "be known first hand", few people believed him. There were also allegations that he had allowed Khalistan terrorist groups to train in Jammu province, although those allegations were never proved. On 2 July 1984, G. M. Shah, who had support from Indira Gandhi, replaced his brother-in-law Farooq Abdullah and became the chief minister of Jammu and Kashmir, after Abdullah was dismissed, in what was termed as a political "coup".[23]  G. M. Shah's administration, which did not have people's mandate, turned to Islamists and opponents of India, notably the Molvi Iftikhar Hussain Ansari, Mohammad Shafi Qureshi and Mohinuddin Salati, to gain some legitimacy through religious sentiments. This gave political space to Islamists who previously lost overwhelmingly in the 1983 state elections.[23] In 1986, Shah decided to construct a mosque within the premises of an ancient Hindu temple inside the New Civil Secretariat area in Jammu to be made available to the Muslim employees for 'Namaz'. People of Jammu took to streets to protest against this decision, which led to a Hindu-Muslim clash.[24] In February 1986, Gul Shah on his return to Kashmir valley retaliated and incited the Kashmiri Muslims by saying Islam khatrey mein hey (trans. Islam is in danger). As a result, Kashmiri Pandits were targeted by the Kashmiri Muslims. Many incidents were reported in various areas where Kashmiri Hindus were killed and their properties and temples damaged or destroyed. The worst hit areas were mainly in South Kashmir and Sopore. In Vanpoh, Lukbhavan, Anantnag, Salar and Fatehpur, Muslim mobs plundered or destroyed the properties and temples of Hindus. During the Anantnag riot in February 1986, although no Hindu was killed, many houses and other properties belonging to Hindus were looted, burnt or damaged.[25] An investigation of Anantnag riots revealed that members of the 'secular parties' in the state, rather than the Islamists, had played a key role in organising the violence to gain political mileage through religious sentiments. Shah called in the army to curb the violence, but it had little effect. His government was dismissed on 12 March 1986, by the then Governor Jagmohan following communal riots in south Kashmir. This led Jagmohan to rule the state directly. The political fight was hence being portrayed as a conflict between "Hindu" New Delhi (Central Government), and its efforts to impose its will in the state, and "Muslim" Kashmir, represented by political Islamists and clerics.[26]  The Islamists had organised under a banner named Muslim United Front, with manifesto to work for Islamic unity and against political interference from the centre, and contested the 1987 state elections, in which they lost again. However, the 1987 elections were widely believed to be rigged so as to bring the secular parties (NC and INC) in Kashmir at the forefront, and this caused the insurgency in Kashmir.[27][28][29][30] The Kashmiri militants killed anyone who openly expressed pro-India policies. Kashmiri Pandits were targeted specifically because they were seen as presenting Indian presence in Kashmir because of their faith.[31] Though the insurgency had been launched by JKLF, groups rose over the next few months advocating for establishment of Nizam-e-Mustafa (Rule of Muhammad). The Islamist groups proclaimed the Islamicisation of socio-political and economic set-up, merger with Pakistan, unification of ummah and establishment of an Islamic Caliphate. Liquidation of central government officials, Pandits, liberal and nationalist intellectuals, social and cultural activists was described as necessary to rid the valley of un-Islamic elements.[32] The relations among the semi-secular and Islamists groups were generally poor and often hostile. The JKLF had also utilized Islamic formulations in its mobilization strategies and public discourse, using Islam and independence interchangeably. It demanded equal rights for everyone however this had a distinct Islamic flavor as it sought to establish an Islamic democracy, protection of minority rights per Quran and Sunnah and an economy of Islamic socialism. The pro-separatist political practices at times deviated from their stated secular position.[33][34]
translated: The Hindus of the Kashmir Valley, were forced to flee the Kashmir valley as a result of being targeted by JKLF and Islamist insurgents during late 1989 and early 1990.[4][5] Of the approximately 300,000[6][7][8] to 600,000[9][10] Hindus living in the Kashmir Valley in 1990 only 2,000тАУ3,000 remain there in 2016.[11]  Exodus of Kashmiri Hindus Part of Insurgency in Jammu and Kashmir Jammu-Kashmir-Ladakh.svg Kashmir Valley in color green Date 1989 and afterwards[1] Location Kashmir Valley Goals Islamisation, ethnic cleansing, independence from India, merger with Pakistan, Sharia law[2] Methods Rape, targeted killing, murder, threats, kidnapping Resulted in Mass Migration of Kashmiri Hindus Casualties Death(s) 200-1,341[3] According to the Indian government, more than 62,000 families are registered as Kashmiri refugees including some Sikh families.[12] Most families were resettled in Jammu, National Capital Region surrounding Delhi and other neighbouring states.[13]  Background  Edit Under the 1975 accord, Sheikh Abdullah agreed to measures previously undertaken by the central government in Jammu and Kashmir to integrate the state into India.[14] Sociologist Farrukh Faheem states that it was met with hostility among people of Kashmir and laid the groundwork for the future insurgency.[15] Those opposed to it included Jamaat-e-Islami Kashmir and People's League in Indian Jammu and Kashmir, and Jammu Kashmir Liberation Front (JKLF) based in Azad Kashmir.[16] Since the mid-1970s, communalist rhetoric was being exploited in the state for votebank politics. Islamization of Kashmir began during 1980's when Abdullah Government changed the names of about 2500 villages from their native names to new Islamic names. The Sheikh also started delivering communal speeches in mosques similar to his speeches in 1930's. Additionally, he referred Kashmiri Pandits as тАЬmukhbirтАЭ or informers of the Indian government.[17][18]  ISI's initial attempts to create unrest in Kashmir against the Indian government were unsuccessful until it started growing in late-1980s.[19] The Afghan jihad against the Soviets, the Islamic Revolution in Iran and the armed struggle of the Sikhs in Punjab against the Indian state became sources of inspiration for large numbers of Kashmiri Muslim youth.[20][21] Both the pro-Independence JKLF and the pro-Pakistan Islamist groups including Jamaat-e-Islami Kashmir mobilised the fast growing anti-Indian sentiments among the Kashmiri population. The year of 1984 saw a pronounced rise in terrorist violence in Kashmir. When the JKLF militant Maqbool Bhat was executed in February 1984, strikes and protests by Kashmiri nationalists broke out in the region, where large number of Kashmiri youth participated in widespread anti-India demonstrations, which faced heavy handed reprisals by the state forces.[22][23]  Critics of the then Chief Minister, Farooq Abdullah, charged that Abdullah was losing control. His visit to Pakistan administered Kashmir during then became an embarrassment, where according to Hashim Qureshi, he shared a platform with JKLF . Though Abdullah asserted that he went on behalf of Indira Gandhi and his father, so that sentiments there could "be known first hand", few people believed him. There were also allegations that he had allowed Khalistan terrorist groups to train in Jammu province, although those allegations were never proved. On 2 July 1984, G. M. Shah, who had support from Indira Gandhi, replaced his brother-in-law Farooq Abdullah and became the chief minister of Jammu and Kashmir, after Abdullah was dismissed, in what was termed as a political "coup".[23]  G. M. Shah's administration, which did not have people's mandate, turned to Islamists and opponents of India, notably the Molvi Iftikhar Hussain Ansari, Mohammad Shafi Qureshi and Mohinuddin Salati, to gain some legitimacy through religious sentiments. This gave political space to Islamists who previously lost overwhelmingly in the 1983 state elections.[23] In 1986, Shah decided to construct a mosque within the premises of an ancient Hindu temple inside the New Civil Secretariat area in Jammu to be made available to the Muslim employees for 'Namaz'. People of Jammu took to streets to protest against this decision, which led to a Hindu-Muslim clash.[24] In February 1986, Gul Shah on his return to Kashmir valley retaliated and incited the Kashmiri Muslims by saying Islam khatrey mein hey (trans. Islam is in danger). As a result, Kashmiri Pandits were targeted by the Kashmiri Muslims. Many incidents were reported in various areas where Kashmiri Hindus were killed and their properties and temples damaged or destroyed. The worst hit areas were mainly in South Kashmir and Sopore. In Vanpoh, Lukbhavan, Anantnag, Salar and Fatehpur, Muslim mobs plundered or destroyed the properties and temples of Hindus. During the Anantnag riot in February 1986, although no Hindu was killed, many houses and other properties belonging to Hindus were looted, burnt or damaged.[25] An investigation of Anantnag riots revealed that members of the 'secular parties' in the state, rather than the Islamists, had played a key role in organising the violence to gain political mileage through religious sentiments. Shah called in the army to curb the violence, but it had little effect. His government was dismissed on 12 March 1986, by the then Governor Jagmohan following communal riots in south Kashmir. This led Jagmohan to rule the state directly. The political fight was hence being portrayed as a conflict between "Hindu" New Delhi (Central Government), and its efforts to impose its will in the state, and "Muslim" Kashmir, represented by political Islamists and clerics.[26]  The Islamists had organised under a banner named Muslim United Front, with manifesto to work for Islamic unity and against political interference from the centre, and contested the 1987 state elections, in which they lost again. However, the 1987 elections were widely believed to be rigged so as to bring the secular parties (NC and INC) in Kashmir at the forefront, and this caused the insurgency in Kashmir.[27][28][29][30] The Kashmiri militants killed anyone who openly expressed pro-India policies. Kashmiri Pandits were targeted specifically because they were seen as presenting Indian presence in Kashmir because of their faith.[31] Though the insurgency had been launched by JKLF, groups rose over the next few months advocating for establishment of Nizam-e-Mustafa (Rule of Muhammad). The Islamist groups proclaimed the Islamicisation of socio-political and economic set-up, merger with Pakistan, unification of ummah and establishment of an Islamic Caliphate. Liquidation of central government officials, Pandits, liberal and nationalist intellectuals, social and cultural activists was described as necessary to rid the valley of un-Islamic elements.[32] The relations among the semi-secular and Islamists groups were generally poor and often hostile. The JKLF had also utilized Islamic formulations in its mobilization strategies and public discourse, using Islam and independence interchangeably. It demanded equal rights for everyone however this had a distinct Islamic flavor as it sought to establish an Islamic democracy, protection of minority rights per Quran and Sunnah and an economy of Islamic socialism. The pro-separatist political practices at times deviated from their stated secular position.[33][34]

translated: LTTE (Sri Lanka), a terrorist organization in Sri Lanka. Once upon a time there used to be a very terrorist organization. The LTTE was the only terrorist organization that had its own Air Force, Navy and Army and its own independent communication system. Which led to the killings of many ministers, from the President of Sri Lanka to the External Affairs Minister, and former Prime Minister of India, Rajiv Gandhi. The struggle between the LTTE and the Sri Lankan army lasted for nearly thirty years. LTTE terrorists used to take cover of hospitals, schools or local villagers to escape after any incident and were able to escape every time. And the local villagers themselves used to stand as a shield for the LTTE. Then the then President Mahindra Rajapaksa took a drastic decision that whoever comes in or helps to kill the terrorists first kill them. If the villagers defend them, then hide the villagers first. As a result, the LTTE remained a history there. In implementing this decision, the President had severely reprimanded the World Human Rights Commission and the whole world that if anyone lashed out in the internal matter of his nation, the outcome would not be good for him either. I think that now to solve the Kashmir problem, the Government of India should also kill the stones coming to the rescue of the terrorists and the villagers who have the opportunity to flee. The militant who carried out the Pulwama incident had a few days ago with the Indian Army but due to the traitorous villagers and the double stonemasons, the terrorist managed to escape safely and this tragic incident happened to our soldiers in Pulwama. Caused Go to hell Human Rights Commission and its weeping, go to hell who traitors to India while staying in India, if there is no human rights for soldiers or their families, then we also do not care about any human rights. When a terrorist organization like LTTE can end, what is the status of Jaish-e-Mohammed and all such terrorist organizations? Only Modi ji has to become Mahindra Rajapaksa. And Modi ji should have full confidence that out of 130 crore people in the country, 30 crore people are removed and 100 crore people are standing with them. translated: LIVE Jammu and Kashmir: the biggest terrorist attack of 2019, 18 CRPF jawans martyred Because the number of soldiers being martyred in it is constantly increasing. The terrorist attack took place in Goripora area of тАЛтАЛAvantipora in Pulwama district. New Delhi: The biggest terrorist attack of 2019 has happened in Jammu and Kashmir. The attack on CRPF convoy going from Jammu to Srinagar was done on Thursday afternoon. According to news agency PTI, 18 CRPF jawans are reported to have been martyred in this attack. The terrorists opened fire on the soldiers in the area and then blasted the IEDs through the car. This attack is being described as a bigger terrorist attack than Uri. The terror attack took place in Goripora area of тАЛтАЛAvantipora in Pulwama district. According to the LIVE TV security officer, Jaish-e-Mohammed claimed responsibility for the IED blast targeting CRPF personnel in Pulwama, Jammu and Kashmir. According to sources, it is being said that this is a suicide attack. This suicide attack was carried out by Jaish terrorist Adil Ahmed Dar. More than 45 jawans have been injured in the attack. The attack happened when the CRPF convoy was going from Jammu to Kashmir. There were 70 vehicles in the convoy. One of the buses has suffered the most. Army officials say that in 2001-02, terrorists have carried out a similar suicide attack. The army says that the way the army has conducted operations against the terrorists, their anger has increased. That is why they have attacked this on the lines of ISIS. According to the police, 2500 personnel were involved in the convoy of the Srinagar-Jammu highway CRPF in Pulwama district. More than 20 soldiers were present in a bus in it. The terrorists fired at the CRPF vehicle while blasting the IED on the convoy. This convoy of security forces was going through the Srinagar-Jammu highway. It is the only highway that connects the Kashmir Valley with the rest of the country. Traffic on this highway was resumed on February 13 after 7 days due to heavy snowfall. The explosion was so tremendous that the children of the bus flew away. A police official said that the IED blast occurred on the Srinagar-Jammu highway in the Avantipura area of тАЛтАЛthe district. Police have identified the terrorist as Adil Ahmed, resident of Kakapora, Pulwama. He told that Ahmed had joined Jaish-e-Mohammed in 2018. Sources in the CRPF say that the IED was installed in a four-wheeler on the road. The car was parked on the highway. As soon as the convoy of security forces passed by the car, it exploded. During this time there is also news of firing on the convoy. In this attack 18 CRPF jawans were killed, while 18 were seriously injured. Most likely it was a remote controlled vehicle IED. According to the report, the terrorists also fired bullets with automatic weapons on the CRPF bus after the IED exploded. Jammu and Kashmir Police Chief Dilbag Singh confirmed the martyrdom of 10 CRPF personnel and said that it could be a suicide attack. A person claiming to be a JEM spokesperson said in a statement to local news agency GNS that it was a suicide attack by the organization.

translated: * FIR lodged against ЁЯЧг  Navjot Singh on disputed тЬН  speech * Punjab minister Navjot Singh Sidhu lodged an FIR against him at Barsoi police station in Katihar on Tuesday for violating election code of conduct by giving controversial speech while addressing an election meeting. Has gone. Additional Chief Electoral Officer Sanjay Kumar Singh said that an FIR has been lodged in Barsoi police station by the flying squad team in the said case. He informed that a report has been sent to the Election Commission for necessary action in this matter. Addressing an election meeting held in Muslim-dominated Katihar in favor of Congress candidate Tariq Anwar, who is involved in the opposition grand alliance, Sidhu while targeting Prime Minister Narendra Modi told the Muslims, 'They are distributing you. The Muslim brothers want to win this by bringing people like Owaisi Saheb here and dividing the votes of you. Read full news here- http://v.duta.us/5FQ0OwAA General elections are starting soon!
